capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he mentioned that Hagrid is actually an adult. I completely agree with him on this one, I've seen Hagrid around Hogwarts and he definitely seems like a grown man to me.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and I think it's a fact that can be confirmed.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry has an owl as a belonging. I'm quite certain about that, and I think it's a pretty standard thing for wizards to have an owl companion, you know? It's just kind of expected at this point.

You know, I've always been fascinated by Harry's belongings, and his owl is definitely one of the most iconic ones. I mean, who wouldn't want an owl as a pet? It's like having your own little companion that can fly around and deliver mail for you. I think it's really cool how Harry was able to form such a strong bond with his owl, and it's amazing how much trust he had in it to carry out important tasks.
